# Citing this User Guide {.unnumbered}

When citing this User Guide, you should use the following:

``` {.html .code-overflow-wrap}

Ramzan F, Mc Grath-Lone L, Gilbert R, Blackburn R, Ruiz Nishiki M, Lilliman M, Stone T, Jay M, Harron K.
Education and Child Health Insights from Linked Data (ECHILD): an introductory guide for researchers. 2023, UCL.
```

BibTex reference:

``` {.bibtex .code-overflow-wrap}

@manual{echild2023,
  author = {Ramzan, F. and McGrath-Lone, L. and Gilbert, R. and Blackburn, R. and Ruiz Nishiki, M. and Lilliman, M. and Stone, T. and Jay, M. and Harron, K.},
  title = {Education and Child Health Insights from Linked Data (ECHILD): an introductory guide for researchers},
  date = {2023},
  url = {https://docs.echild.ac.uk/},
  publisher = {UCL}
}
```
